name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】重大告知あり！ #天音かなた生誕祭 「堕天使の憂鬱」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Melancholy of the Fallen Angel＂【ホロライブ】 [UdbB5g1ncHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'Non-Fiction' in a dark, goth-themed outfit with neon green laser lights.
Instrumental transition scene with glowing white flowers and a change to a white idol outfit.
Amane Kanata performs 'U' in her white angel idol outfit in a grand, cathedral-like hall.

subtitles.original: たんたん オリジナリティ
subtitles.english: Clack-clack, originality

subtitles.original: どーだかなんとか模索していけって
subtitles.english: How about searching for it somehow?

subtitles.original: イバラでバラバラなの
subtitles.english: Falling apart in the thorns

subtitles.original: 何個したかもわかんないお邪魔だ
subtitles.english: I don't know how many times I've been a nuisance

subtitles.original: 良心されてんだ どうかしてるよ
subtitles.english: Being pampered by your conscience, you're crazy

subtitles.original: なってそっちのセリフよ
subtitles.english: That's my line

subtitles.original: まあいいから 全部聞き流してください どうか
subtitles.english: Well, whatever, just let it all go in one ear and out the other, please

subtitles.original: バカクソゴミクズ汚い言葉で誰かを傷つけた
subtitles.english: Hurt someone with stupid, shitty, trashy, dirty words

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかないの
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 脳内じゃ正義だもんね 突っ立ってたって
subtitles.english: It's justice in your head, isn't it? Just standing there

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 愛して 愛して
subtitles.english: Love me, love me

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 第三次世界は手の込んだ犯罪
subtitles.english: The Third World is a sophisticated crime

subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 何やっても元に戻りはしない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do will return it to how it was

subtitles.original: だんだんとさ気づいてんだ どうかしてたって
subtitles.english: I'm gradually realizing I was crazy

subtitles.original: 何をしても元に戻りはしない
subtitles.english: No matter what I do, it won't return to normal

subtitles.original: どうして どうして
subtitles.english: Why, why?

subtitles.original: 何をしても元に戻りはしない
subtitles.english: No matter what I do, it won't return to normal

subtitles.original: 観客は満杯だもんね 実行してたって
subtitles.english: The audience is full, right? Even if I carried it out

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: はあ
subtitles.english: Ha...

subtitles.original: そっか 気づいて傷ついて そうだ
subtitles.english: I see, realizing and getting hurt, that's it

subtitles.original: あっという間に シチュエーションは 支離滅裂な不規則なんです
subtitles.english: In the blink of an eye, the situation is incoherent and irregular

subtitles.original: ダンス、ダンス、ダンスを踊れ 踊れ 満喫パーティー
subtitles.english: Dance, dance, dance, dance! Enjoy the party

subtitles.original: 羽振らして しらばくれて ちくしょう
subtitles.english: Acting big, playing dumb, goddamn it

subtitles.original: 一般ピープル個性だの個性だって
subtitles.english: Ordinary people talking about individuality this and that

subtitles.original: 鉄板のネタもはや全部がご法度
subtitles.english: The standard jokes are all taboo now

subtitles.original: 私がこれまでどれだけ努力したかしてないかに関わらないまま
subtitles.english: Regardless of how much effort I have or haven't put in until now

subtitles.original: 独自の物差し当てがってんのよ 今に見てろクソが
subtitles.english: You're applying your own unique yardstick. Just you wait, piece of shit

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.english: It's justice in your head, isn't it? Just standing there

subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.english: Love me, love me

subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 戦線は恐々だもんね 突っ立ってたって
subtitles.english: The front lines are in trepidation, right? Just standing there

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 愛して 愛さないで
subtitles.english: Love me, don't love me

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 心配してるフリしてんのも気づいてるよ
subtitles.english: I've noticed you're just pretending to be worried

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 何やってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes right

subtitles.original: 何もやってないだけじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it just that you're not doing anything?

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala 誰も知らない 名もない今を 駆け抜けていくの
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala dashing through this unknown, nameless present

subtitles.original: あの三日月に手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reaching out to that crescent moon

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala 君を知りたい 声にならない 臆病な朝を
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala I want to know you, these timid mornings that have no voice

subtitles.original: 例え何度迎えようとも
subtitles.english: No matter how many times they come

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala...
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala...

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala...
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala...

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala...
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala...

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala...
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala...

subtitles.original: 足音がパチンと切られたその時 世界と逸れてしまったみたいだ
subtitles.english: The moment the footsteps were snapped shut, it's like I strayed from the world

subtitles.original: 目に映る景色が悲しくなれるなら 恐れずまぶたを閉じてごらん
subtitles.english: If the scenery you see makes you sad, try closing your eyes without fear

subtitles.original: さあ皆様こちらへどうぞ 鼓動の鳴る方へさあ
subtitles.english: Now, everyone, step this way, towards the sound of the heartbeat

subtitles.original: 踵を打ち鳴らせどうぞ 心の踊る方へさあ
subtitles.english: Stomp your heels, please, towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: 蜃気楼に飛び乗って 逆さまの世界を乗りこなして
subtitles.english: Jump onto a mirage and master this upside-down world

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala 止まない愛を知りたいと願うおまじない
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala a charm wishing to know unending love

subtitles.original: 時を超えて咲くら夜まで
subtitles.english: Across time, until the blooming night

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala 君を知りたい何一つ見逃さぬように
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala I want to know you, so I don't miss a single thing

subtitles.original: 時は誰も待ってくれないの
subtitles.english: Time waits for no one

subtitles.original: 残酷な運命が抗えぬ宿命が 考える間もなく押し寄せるなら
subtitles.english: If cruel fate and irresistible destiny come rushing in without time to think

subtitles.original: 目が見えなくたって君を信じてみたいの 恐れずに一歩踏み出したら
subtitles.english: Even if I can't see, I want to try believing in you. If you take a step without fear

subtitles.original: 鼓動の鳴る方へさあ 踵を打ち鳴らせどうぞ 心の踊る方へさあ
subtitles.english: Towards the sound of the heartbeat, stomp your heels, please, towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: さあ皆様こちらへどうぞ 鼓動の鳴る方へさあ
subtitles.english: Now, everyone, step this way, towards the sound of the heartbeat

subtitles.original: 踵を打ち鳴らせどうぞ 心の踊る方へさあ
subtitles.english: Stomp your heels, please, towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: 空飛ぶクジラに飛び乗って 逆さまの世界を踊り尽くせ
subtitles.english: Jump onto a flying whale and dance through this upside-down world

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala 誰も知らない 名もない今を 駆け抜けていくの
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala dashing through this unknown, nameless present

subtitles.original: あの三日月に手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reaching out to that crescent moon

subtitles.original: Lalalala Lalalala 君を知りたい 声にならない 臆病な朝を
subtitles.english: Lalalala Lalalala I want to know you, these timid mornings that have no voice

subtitles.original: 例え何度迎えようとも
subtitles.english: No matter how many times they come

subtitles.original: 夢ならば醒めないで 現実なんて何物でもないくらい
subtitles.english: If it's a dream, don't wake me up, so much so that reality becomes nothing at all

subtitles.original: 時は誰も待ってくれないの
subtitles.english: Time waits for no one
